AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where aliens were being smuggled into and where undocumented aliens were attempted to be brought into
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country where smuggling operation originated and where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez previously ventured to smuggle undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: city where permit was obtained and smuggling operation proceeded
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Sabinas Hidalgo: city where meeting with undocumented aliens took place, where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez was allegedly seen by Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's parents, and where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez was on November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a restaurant in Sabinas Hidalgo: location of meeting between smugglers and undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio, Texas: location where Graciela Castaneda and her husband had brunch with Alfredo Ortega-Chavez, and location where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez had been on the day in question
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location where the juror's friend, another female lawyer, is from
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.courtroom: location where trial of Alfredo Ortega-Chavez took place, conducted fairly and impartially by Judge Kazen
